info.title: Welcome to Kubernetes-Playground.io
description: Operator Playground provides ready to use pre-configured Kubernetes environment for experimentation.

Bringing the promise of operators to Kubernetes and OpenShift to assemble your own stack.  Deploy in the cloud or your data center or local laptop with ready to use logic, api and data without burdening yourself with installation details. You can work as team or use your own project namespace.

keyFeatures.text: Operator Playground leverages the power of Kubernetes / Openshift operators.
Users can try the Operators and their provided examples to explore and understand the operators.
Hassle free deployment of operators with a click of a button.
Supported User Guide for Operators for ease of use.
Collection of Swagger APIs for use on Operator Playground.
Rich set of Datasets of type S3 and CSV for use.

Detailed instruction on: #-About the Operator #-Architecture #-How to deploy Operator (set of user instructions) #-An example that helps users to understand a use-case of application development with Operators.

info.postLogin_title: Free sponsered trial environments on IBM Cloud
postLogin_description: Some description on benefits of OpenSource Operators in IBM Cloud

tiles.title: Custom Stack
tiles.description: Prepare your own operator stack using various operators

usefulLinks.title: Skaffold
usefulLinks.description: Skaffold handles the workflow for building, pushing and deploying your application, allowing you to focus on what matters most: writing code.
